meta.learningGoals: <par>In this skill you learn to <term>solve a linear equation that has fractions</term> with the unknown in the denominator. For an equation like <inline-math/> you will be able to find the solution <inline-math/>. This includes <skill-link>multiplying all equation terms</skill-link> by a factor to get <inline-math/> out of any denominator, and subsequently <skill-link>solving the resulting linear equation</skill-link> in the default way. Effectively, this allows the solution of any type of linear equation.</par>
